control.description-key: View PDF and image files from Dataverse file columns

property.name: boundField
property.description-key: Bind to any text field. The control auto-discovers file columns on the record.

property.name: defaultFileColumn
property.description-key: Logical name of the file column to display by default (e.g., rsm_contractfile). Leave empty to auto-select.

property.name: rows
property.description-key: Number of rows to display (controls height, default: 10)

property.name: showToolbar
property.description-key: Show the toolbar with zoom, navigation, and other controls

property.name: showSidebar
property.description-key: Show the sidebar with thumbnails and document outline

property.name: defaultZoom
property.description-key: Initial zoom level: auto, page-fit, page-width, or percentage (e.g., 100)

property.name: theme
property.description-key: Color theme: light, dark, or auto (follows system)

property.name: totalPages
property.description-key: Total number of pages in the document
